activities:
The company’s proprietary software system called “Campaign1by1” works with (a) a client company’s marketing database or CRM system to obtain transaction data , and (b) with the client’s web analytics provider to obtain browse data. These data are used to create marketing and customer service campaigns that react to these consumer initiatives.  Once the data are received, Campaign 1by1 allows marketers to define the specifics of their campaigns, including the audience, the template, the static content (graphics, copy and offer), dynamic content (products, copy, etc…), and tracking requirements.
Once these are defined, the system will create the tables required for the dynamic content.  This will be integrated with the other campaign components and provided to the appropriate channel/vendor for delivery.
privacyprograms: Direct Marketing Association Safe Harbor program
recoursemech: Direct Marketing Association Safe Harbor program
